author: Isabel Debre / AP
title: War-Torn Yemen Confirms First Coronavirus Case
description: Yemen’s government announced the first confirmed case of coronavirus in the war-torn country.
content:
(CAIRO) — Yemen’s internationally recognized government Friday announced the first confirmed case of coronavirus in the war-torn country, stoking fears that an outbreak could devastate an already crippled health care system.
